multiple-choice.name: Multiple Choice

validation.correct-answer-index: number, must be valid index in choices array

examples: ما هي عاصمة المملكة العربية السعودية؟
في أي سنة تم فتح مكة المكرمة؟
multiple-choice.promptExample: Question: "ما هي عاصمة المملكة العربية السعودية؟" with choices ["الرياض", "جدة", "مكة", "المدينة"]

image.name: Image Recognition
image.description: Questions that require recognizing something in an image

validation.image-context: string, must be one of: arabic-calligraphy, plant, country
validation.choices: array of strings, minimum 2 choices (if provided)
validation.correct-answer-index: number, must be valid index in choices array (required if choices are provided)

image.promptExample: Question: "تعرف على هذا المعلم التاريخي" with image-hint "معلم تاريخي شهير في مصر القديمة يعكس العمارة الفرعونية" and correct-answer "الأهرامات"

voice.name: Audio Recognition
voice.description: Questions that require recognizing something in audio

validation.audio-url: string, valid URL to an audio file
validation.transcript: string, optional text content of the audio for accessibility

examples: حدد نوع هذا الطائر من صوته
voice.promptExample: Question: "استمع واكتب اسم هذا المقام الموسيقي" with audio-url "example.com/maqam.mp3" and correct-answer "مقام البيات"

range.name: Numeric Range
range.description: Questions with numeric answers within a specified range

validation.range: number, must be declared as the acceptable range around the correct value considering min-value and max-value
validation.min-value: number, the lower bound of the acceptable range
validation.max-value: number, must be greater than min-value
validation.correct-answer: number, the exact correct answer (must be between min-value and max-value)

examples: في أي سنة هجرية وقعت معركة بدر؟
range.promptExample: Question: "كم يبلغ ارتفاع برج خليفة؟" with min-value: 700, max-value: 900, correct-answer: 828, range: 10, unit: "متر"

video.name: Video Recognition
video.description: Questions that require recognizing something in a video

validation.video-url: string, valid URL to a video file
validation.correct-answer-index: number, must be valid index in choices array

video.promptExample: Question: "حدد اسم هذه المعركة التاريخية" with video-url "example.com/battle.mp4"

validation.points: number, must be one of [100, 300, 500] representing easy, medium, and hard difficulty

distribution.description: How to distribute questions across enabled types

options.even: Distribute questions evenly across all enabled types
options.manual: Use exact counts specified in questionTypes
